channel.title: Comments on: Wahhhhh, no-one knows my company exists

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: Hi Ger, Gordon Murray is doing some stuff on this if you want to contact him.
item.content:encoded: Hi Ger, Gordon Murray is doing some stuff on this if you want to contact him.

item.title: By: Ger Hartnett
item.dc:creator: Ger Hartnett
item.description: Conor. I'll do what I can to help out next week. Sure post the plans up here and maybe someone else will help too.
item.content:encoded: Conor. I’ll do what I can to help out next week. Sure post the plans up here and maybe someone else will help too.

item.title: By: Lilly
item.dc:creator: Lilly
item.description:
Hi Conor,
Have you checked out TradeVibes yet? TradeVibes is the best place to discover, research and discuss hot (or not so hot) startups. We're a startup wiki with over 12,000 company profiles with quite a few Irish startups included (see here for Irish startups on TradeVibes: http://bit.ly/ujC7).
We also offer widgets so you can profile your own company or other startup companies on your blog.
Take a look and let us know what you think!
Lilly
item.content:encoded:
Hi Conor,

Have you checked out TradeVibes yet? TradeVibes is the best place to discover, research and discuss hot (or not so hot) startups. We’re a startup wiki with over 12,000 company profiles with quite a few Irish startups included (see here for Irish startups on TradeVibes: http://bit.ly/ujC7).

We also offer widgets so you can profile your own company or other startup companies on your blog.

Take a look and let us know what you think!

Lilly

item.title: By: Jeff Widman

item.description:
Glad you guys like it!
Always feel free to send suggestions for ways to improve it... -- Jeff Widman CrunchBase.com
item.content:encoded:
Glad you guys like it!

Always feel free to send suggestions for ways to improve it…

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: Yes, we have some neat mashup plans. Just need someone to volunteer to do the work!
item.content:encoded: Yes, we have some neat mashup plans. Just need someone to volunteer to do the work!

item.title: By: Ger Hartnett
item.dc:creator: Ger Hartnett
item.description: Are there any plans to change http://www.web2ireland.org/companies/ to use the crunchbase data?
